00045 // Function:            CalcAngle
00046 //
00047 // Last Modified by:    Roby Atadero
00048 //
00049 // Last Modified:       Oct 12, 2007
00050 //
00051 // Function:            Takes two points and returns the angle the second point
00052 //                      makes with the first in radians.
00053 //                      Ex. Point 1 = (0, 0)   Point 2 = (2, 2)
00054 //
00055 //
00056 //                      |   o P2
00057 //                      |  /
00058 //                      | /
00059 //                      |/ )  = 45 Degrees         Returns 45 degrees in radians
00060 //                      o--------------            I.E.  45 deg = sqrt(2)/2
00061 //                     P1
00062 //
00063 // Inputs:              double x - The x coordinate of the first point
00064 //                      double y1 - The y coordinate of the first point
00065 //                      double dX2_ - The x coordinate of the second point
00066 //                      double dY2_ - The y coordinate of the second point
00067 //
00068 // Outputs:             None.
00069 //
00070 // Returns:             The radian angle the second point makes with the first.
00072
